H0.text: Subtract the mass of the container is the step students must take before recording the mass of the decomposing leaves on the balance when measuring a small pile of leaves before and after decomposition.

H1.text: Add leaves from other plants to the container is the step students must take before recording the mass of a small pile of leaves before and after the leaves decompose.

H2.text: Allowing the leaves to settle in the container for a few days is what the students must do before recording the mass of the small pile of leaves on the balance when measuring its mass before and after the leaves decompose.

H3.text: Using a metric ruler to measure the volume of the container is what the students must do before recording the mass of the leaves placed in the container on the balance.
